name: Fall Forward SGX 2018 Demo
description:
Open World First person platformer created by 3 AM Game Studios at, situated at UW-Stout. This is the SGX Spring 2018 Demo version, nowhere near final version.

Use a mix of movement styles to collect all the collectables

Wallrun, Climb, Rope sling, double jump, air-dash, glide

You play your way. 

Join the discord to follow development of this game and contribute:

https://discord.gg/d3x2uuh
